name: Robin Hood Day Ticket (Nottingham area)
description: ROBIN HOOD DAY TICKET Unlimited travel for one day on buses, trams and trains within the Robin Hood Network in Greater Nottingham. The boundary stations for rail are Attenborough, Bulwell, Carlton and Netherfield and include Beeston and Nottingham. A list of bus operators can be found on the Robin Hood website.
route_restrictions: Unlimited travel for one day on buses, trams and trains within the Robin Hood Network in Greater Nottingham. The boundary stations for rail are Attenborough, Bulwell, Carlton and Netherfield and include Beeston and Nottingham. A list of bus operators can be found on the Robin Hood website.
where_to_buy: Valid ticket to travel is required unless boarded at a station without ticket-issuing facilities
